rules_text:
First strike
[i]Flirt[/i] – Whenever Inigo, Flower Picker attacks, the defending player may create a Treasure token. If they do, Inigo and up to one other target attacking creature can't be blocked this combat.
[i]Even Rhythm[/i] – Whenever you cast a spell that has an even mana value, untap up to one target creature you control.
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {1}{G}{W}
